products.name: Women's Kalina Geometric Drawstring Cover-Up Minidress - Aquamarine - Size Small
products.brandedName: Ulla Johnson Women's Kalina Geometric Drawstring Cover-Up Minidress - Aquamarine - Size Small
products.unbrandedName: Women's Kalina Geometric Drawstring Cover-Up Minidress - Aquamarine - Size Small
products.description: Crafted of a sheer cotton blend, Ulla Johnson's flutter-sleeve Kalina cover-up minidress flaunts a Shibori-inspired print and an adjustable drawstring waist. The lightweight style is finished with a contrast beaded trim and playful flounce hem. Plunging split neck, tie closure Flutter sleeves Adjustable drawstring waist Side seam pockets Beaded trim Pulls over 55% cotton/45% viscose Machine wash Imported SIZE & FIT This style is designed for a boxy fit About 36" from shoulder to hem Model measurements: 6'3" tall Model is wearing a US size Small ABOUT THE BRAND Manhattan-based designer Ulla Johnson credits her archaeologist parents as inspiration for her namesake ready-to-wear label, founded in 1998. Natural fibers, easy fits and meticulous finishes are seen in each collection, which incorporate sweeping silhouettes, and printing and dyeing techniques from around the world. Outerwear And Swimwear - Contemporary Swim > Ulla Johnson > Saks Fifth Avenue > Barneys. Ulla Johnson. Color: Aquamarine. Size: Small.

products.name: Black Mesh Kayla Espadrille Flats
products.brandedName: Loeffler Randall Black Mesh Kayla Espadrille Flats
products.description: Loeffler Randall cherishes quality, craftsmanship, and originality. The female-founded brand consists of expertly designed shoes and accessories that have soul and a story to tell. These are not-your-average espadrilles! With a mesh body, ballet flat silhouette, and platform braided sole, the Black Mesh Kayla Espadrille Flats combine all of your favorite details into one shoe. An easy staple with unique details, you can stand apart from a crowd in these warm-weather beauties! Pair with everything from denim to maxis to skirts! Almond toe Fixed bow detail on toe Elastic arch strap Platform braided sole Ballet flat silhouette Mesh body Material: 100% Nylon (upper), 100% Rubber (outsole) Care: Store in box provided, avoid water, seek professional care if needed

products.name: adidas VL Court Bold Sneaker

products.description: Take your style and comfort to a new level with the adidas VL Court Bold sneaker. Combining skateboarding style with streetwear looks, this low-cut sneaker comes with a leather upper for a contemporary touch, side signature stripes for an iconic look, and sturdy rubber sole with multiple tread patterns for a reliable grip.

products.name: LAUREN Ralph Lauren Houndstooth Belted Crepe Shirtdress (Cream/Black) Women's Dress
products.brandedName: Lauren Ralph Lauren Houndstooth Belted Crepe Shirtdress (Cream/Black) Women's Dress
products.unbrandedName: Houndstooth Belted Crepe Shirtdress (Cream/Black) Women's Dress
products.description: The primary materials that compose this product contain a minimum of 20 percent recycled content. ; Step out in style by wearing the LAUREN Ralph Lauren Houndstooth Belted Crepe Shirtdress. This sophisticated dress boasts a classic pointed collar with a button placket, elegant long sleeves with buttoned barrel cuffs, and two side on-seam pockets for a practical touch. The threaded belt loops and removable self-belt allow for a customized fit. Finished with a back yoke and a vintage-inspired houndstooth print, this dress is a timeless and versatile choice for any occasion. Straight fit. A-line silhouette. Buttoned front closure. LRL-engraved metal buttons at the collar and cuffs. Intended to hit at the mid-calf. Shirttail hem. Unlined. 100% recycled polyester. Machine washable or dry-clean. Imported.
